compliant.section: 職業駕駛與合作外送夥伴也可透過「App 設定」>「緊急資料分享」選單，或使用「安全工具箱」啟用/停用緊急資料分享功能。
compliant.legal provisions: Data subject consent; Explicit consent for special categories of data

compliant.section: 使用者的啟用此功能，讓 Uber 透過推播通知分享優惠資訊和最新消息。使用者可在此處控制是否接收推播通知。
compliant.legal provisions: Consent as a legal basis for processing; Right to object, including to direct marketing

compliant.section: 使用者得授權第三方 App 存取其 Uber 帳戶資料，以啟用其他功能。使用者可在此處或透過 Uber 的 隱私權中心，檢閱/撤銷第三方 App 的存取權限。
compliant.legal provisions: Consent as a legal basis for processing; Right to withdraw consent; Right of access; Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

compliant.section: 乘客可在 Uber App 的主選單查看自己的平均評分，也能在 Uber 的隱私權中心查看平均評分的明細。

non_compliant.section: 每趟行程結束後，職業駕駛和乘客能夠給予對方 1 到 5 的評分。這些評分的平均值會連結至使用者帳戶，而提供或接受服務的其他使用者將可查看評分資訊。例如，職業駕駛可查看叫車乘客的評分，乘客亦可查看職業駕駛評分。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data; Explicit consent for special categories of data
non_compliant.amend: While processing data for the purpose of a rating or review system is permissible, linking this data to user accounts in a way that allows for identification and potential inferences about character represents processing of sensitive data. To comply with GDPR, Uber should either: (1) obtain explicit consent from users for the processing of this data for this specific purpose, clearly outlining the nature of the processing and its potential implications; or (2) anonymize the rating system in a way that prevents the identification of individuals, for example, by displaying only aggregate ratings without linking them to specific user accounts.
